text: Hey, {name}. This is {company_name}. Here is the link to the {form_type} for your course {course_name}. Please note that you cannot receive your course completion certificate without completing and taking this {form_type}. {form_url}

email.subject: {form_type} is ready for {course_name}
email.body:
Hey {name},

Here is the link to the {form_type} for your course {course_name}.

{form_url}

Please note that you cannot receive your course completion certificate without completing and taking this {form_type}.

Please call us at {company_phone} if you have any questions.

Learning Management System Login: {company_url}

Respectfully,

{company_name}

P: {company_phone}

E: {company_email}
